body_html:
I've also experienced this error using TensorFlow on POWER8, and have now also
just hit it on a source installation of caffe2 on POWER8. So this may not be
an issue with TensorFlow. My environment:

System: Power8 Minsky, 4xP100
OS: Ubuntu 16.04.2
CUDA: cuda-repo-ubuntu1604-8-0-local-ga2v2_8.0.61-1_ppc64el.deb
cuDNN: 5.1.10
Python: 2.7
NVIDIA Driver: 375.51

I'm curious, what kinds of GPUs is everyone running? @pedrogusmao and I are on
P100 and having this issue. How about @abdasgupta and @antoajayraj?

body:
I've also experienced this error using TensorFlow on POWER8, and have now also
just hit it on a source installation of caffe2 on POWER8. So this may not be
an issue with TensorFlow. My environment:

System:        Power8 Minsky, 4xP100
OS:            Ubuntu 16.04.2
CUDA:          cuda-repo-ubuntu1604-8-0-local-ga2v2_8.0.61-1_ppc64el.deb
cuDNN:         5.1.10
Python:        2.7
NVIDIA Driver: 375.51

I'm curious, what kinds of GPUs is everyone running? @pedrogusmao and I are on
P100 and having this issue. How about @abdasgupta and @antoajayraj?
